title: Klondike Gold Rush National Historical Park: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Klondike Gold Rush NHP offers teachers an excellent professional development opportunity to bring the adventure of a lifetime to their classroom.  While teachers are spending time as a Teacher Ranger Teacher in Skagway, AK they will hike secitons of the Chilkoot Trail, visit ghost towns, and experience Alaska's wilderness. Join Us and apply now! All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers
